Item.Value: Not now sorry, I've got something on my mind. I'm $Character_4$, nice to meet you, etcetera, everything else can wait.
Oh, hello. I guess I have a moment. My latest experiment hasn't proven fruitful.
For me? Oh no, you shouldn't have!
You got this for me? I... thank you. really, this will be invaluable to my research.
Hey, $^$, what do you need?[Talk:Talk|Gift:GiveGift|%Friend:50%Join Party:Party|Never Mind:Cancel]
Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.
Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?
I hate weather like this. It just serves to delay my research.
Hm. I'm thinking I might take a walk. I despise the rain, but there are several species of flowers I'm interested in that only bloom in the rain.
